name: bbcat-orchestration-builder-electron-app
description: Electron desktop application for generating orchestrated audio applications.
author: Kristian Hentschel <Kristian.Hentschel@bbc.co.uk>

scripts.build: yarn build-frontend && yarn build-servers && yarn build-main && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar.unpackDir=node_modules/@bbc/bbcat-orchestration-template
scripts.build-main: yarn clean && mkdir ./dist/ && babel src -s -d dist
scripts.dev: concurrently "(cd ../react-frontend && yarn dev)" "(yarn build-servers && yarn build-main && NODE_ENV=development electron .)"
